TopicTitle: Heavy Planetary Lander + 5 On-Board Rovers! - Full interplanetary rocket

Articles.Content:
So I have an issue with getting to a planet, making a smooth landing, and then saying "now what?".

To answer that question I designed the "heavy lander with 5 rovers", capable of carrying 7 Kerbal astronauts to almost any planet in the system (I even landed it on Laythe, the ocean moon). Basically, you de-stage the upper rover (which seats 2 kerbals) while descending through the atmosphere, make a small adjustment, then activate the main lander shutes.

Upon landing, you deploy 4 more - yes, four - rovers that each hold one kerbal. The possibilities now at your finger tips from having a fleet of 5 rovers on a planet are endless.

You need the NovaPunch mod parts set for this craft. Enjoy!
